com.leaf.clips.model.beacon

Class BeaconManagerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • Service
      • com.leaf.clips.model.beacon.BeaconManagerAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BeaconRanger, org.altbeacon.beacon.BeaconConsumer, org.altbeacon.beacon.MonitorNotifier, org.altbeacon.beacon.RangeNotifier, org.altbeacon.beacon.startup.BootstrapNotifier

    public class BeaconManagerAdapter
extends Service
implements BeaconRanger, org.altbeacon.beacon.BeaconConsumer, org.altbeacon.beacon.startup.BootstrapNotifier, org.altbeacon.beacon.RangeNotifier
    Classe che si occupa del rilevamento dei beacon. Estende la classe android.app.Service e implementa le interfacce org.altbeacon.beacon.BeaconConsumer e org.altbeacon.beacon.startup.BootstrapNotifier

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BeaconManagerAdapter.LocalBinder
      Classe definita per permettere la comunicazione tra processi (IPC), in questo caso permette di comunicare con i metodi pubblici definiti internamente ad una classe Service.
